changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: Node Table add space id index
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}node` ADD INDEX `idx_space_id`(`space_id`) USING BTREE;

changeSet.author: penglongfeng
changeSet.comment: Robot Table add x_service_token„ÄÅseq_id and uk_seq_resource_id
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}automation_robot` ADD COLUMN `seq_id` varchar(64) NULL COMMENT 'Request source request number' AFTER `updated_at`, ADD COLUMN `x_service_token` varchar(128) NULL COMMENT 'Service Provider Certification Token' AFTER `seq_id`, ADD UNIQUE INDEX `uk_seq_resource_id`(`seq_id`, `resource_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT 'Unique number of single table robot creation request';

changeSet.author: penglongfeng
changeSet.comment: Automation Action Table add robot id index
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}automation_action` ADD INDEX `idx_robot_id`(`robot_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT 'Robot ID Index';
